name: Escape: Quantum
description:
Escape an escape room inspired by the quantum mechanics mechanic of Outer Wilds! If you're not looking at something, it could be anywhere at all.

Pressing 'p' will bring up the options menu, from there you can change the mouse sensitivity and the global volume.

We hope you like it!

Created by Steven Dunn (myself), and Taryn Allen.

This was a submission for the Game Maker's Toolkit 2020 game jam.
